mods.abstract: Two color window card (red on green) announcing Pan American Blues, presented by Lost and Found Sound, on NPR's All Things Considered on November 24 and hear the stories of DeFord Bailey and the birth of the Grand Ole Opry on WSM radio. Poster features woodcuts of a train and a microphone and radio tower. Pan American Blues is DeFord Bailey's trademark song.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
